name: level_1
content: Hello you, yes you, there is no one else here little genius so yes i’m talking to you, well, let me explain you the situation, hmm actually nop i don’t want to , i’m sure you can see what’s wrong here, oh pizzas ! If you got problems to succeed something this simple you can get one and watch a video or two on the PC

name: level2_start
content: You are in a good place here. We will take time to get to know each others, you are Sadami Haraguchi it’s correct ?  Maybe you thought you were on a mission, that your secretary called you to visit a mother’s house. You don’t say ! Laugh You’ll work for me a litte right now, okey ? You see these lasers ? Go take the garbage in the box and I’ll open the path. [[level2_choice1]] [[level2_choice2]]

children.name: level2_choice2
children.content: Oh, you swtiched the light ? You’re so cute, aaaand, you’re right ! This type of glow is perfect for this room !
